articles.content: File photo: Amelia Kerr reached her century and hit the winning runs on the same ball  •  Gallo Images/Getty Images

articles.title: Preview: Manolo Marquez embarks on a new era as FC Goa host Punjab FC - Indian Super League
articles.description: FC Goa will host Punjab FC for the Gaurs’ opening fixture of the Indian Super League (ISL) 2023-24 season at the Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium, in Goa, on Monday.
